title: App Launch and Splash Screen Display
description: Verify the splash screen displays correctly during app bootstrap and transitions to the next screen based on user state.

steps.description: Launch the app.
Splash screen is visible immediately on launch.
App bootstrap processes execute without error.

title: Onboarding Flow for First-Time Users
description: Verify new users are guided through the onboarding screens before the login screen.

steps.description: Launch app as a new user without stored credentials.
Onboarding screens appear in correct sequence.
Navigate through onboarding to completion.
Onboarding completion navigates to login screen.

title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Check login success with correct username and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login screen.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
User is authenticated and navigated to company selection or dashboard screen.

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login fails with incorrect username or password and error messages display appropriately.

steps.description: Navigate to login screen.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Login is rejected with appropriate error message shown.

title: Multi-Tenant Company Selection Screen
description: Verify that after login, users with multiple companies are prompted to select one and that selection routes correctly.

steps.description: Login as user belonging to multiple companies.
Company selection screen is displayed.
Select a company from the list.
App navigates to the role-specific dashboard for the selected company.

title: Role-Specific Dashboard Display - Admin
description: Verify that an Admin user sees the admin dashboard with correct tabs and sections including reports, employee management, attendance, and settings.

steps.description: Login as Admin user and select company.
Admin dashboard loads with bottom navigation tabs visible.
Tabs for reports, employee management, attendance overview, break types, leave approvals, and settings are accessible.

title: Role-Specific Dashboard Display - Employee
description: Verify that an Employee user sees the employee dashboard focusing on personal attendance, timesheets, leave, notifications, and profile.

steps.description: Login as Employee user and select company.
Employee dashboard is loaded with relevant bottom navigation tabs.
Sections for attendance tracking, timesheet submissions, leave applications, notifications, and user profile are present.

title: Attendance Management - View Daily Timeline
description: Verify that users can view their daily attendance timeline with all logged punches and breaks displayed correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to attendance screen from dashboard.
Daily timeline is displayed, showing clock-in/out times and break periods.

title: Attendance Management - Admin Break Types Administration
description: Verify that Admin can add, update, and delete break types in the break types management screen.

steps.description: Navigate to Admin Break Types screen.
Add a new break type with valid parameters.
Break type is added and visible in the list.
Edit an existing break type.
Changes to break type are saved and displayed.
Delete a break type.
Break type is removed from the list.

title: Leave Management - Apply for Leave
description: Verify employees can submit leave requests with required fields and confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to Apply Leave screen.
Fill in leave request details with valid data.
Submit leave request.
Leave request submission is successful and visible in leave history.

title: Leave Management - Admin Approve and Reject Leave Requests
description: Verify Admin can approve or reject leave requests and updates reflect correctly in leave balances and history.

steps.description: Navigate to Admin Leave Approvals screen.
Pending leave requests are listed.
Approve a leave request.
Leave request status updates to approved.
Reject another leave request.
Leave request status updates to rejected.

title: Timesheet Submission by Employee
description: Verify that employees can submit daily or weekly timesheets with required fields and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to Employee Timesheet screen.
Enter timesheet details with valid data.
Submit timesheet.
Submission is successful and timesheet is listed appropriately.

title: Timesheet Admin Approval Workflow
description: Verify Admin can view submitted timesheets and approve or reject them updating status accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to Admin Timesheet Approvals screen.
Submitted timesheets are listed with correct details.
Approve a timesheet entry.
Timesheet status changes to approved.
Reject another timesheet entry.
Timesheet status changes to rejected.

title: Time Tracking - Time Entry Logging
description: Verify that users can log time entries with start and end times and that entries persist across sessions.

steps.description: Navigate to Time Tracking screen.
Log a new time entry with valid start and end times.
Time entry is displayed in the list.
Close and reopen the app.
Previously logged time entries persist and are shown.

title: Admin Employee Management - Filtering and Search
description: Verify Admin can filter and search employees in the management screen and correct filtered results are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to Admin Employees management screen.
Use filter controls to filter employees by department, status or role.
Filtered employee list updates accordingly.
Use search box to lookup employee by name.
Employee list shows employees matching search keywords.

title: Notifications Management - Mark All as Read and Filtering
description: Verify users can mark all notifications as read and filter notifications based on roles and read/unread status.

steps.description: Open Notifications screen.
List of notifications is displayed with accurate read/unread statuses.
Mark all notifications as read.
All notifications update to read status.
Apply filters to view only unread notifications or by role.
List updates to show filtered notifications.

title: User Profile - View and Edit Personal Data
description: Verify users can view and successfully edit their profile information and changes persist.

steps.description: Navigate to Profile screen.
Current profile information is displayed.
Edit fields such as name, phone number, or email with valid data.
Save changes.
Profile updates reflect immediately and persist after app restart.

title: Company Calendar - Month View and Admin Controls
description: Verify the company calendar displays the month view correctly and Admin controls allow adding and editing calendar events.

steps.description: Navigate to Company Calendar screen.
Month view calendar is displayed with events correctly marked.
As Admin, add a new calendar event.
New event appears on the calendar.
Edit existing calendar event.
Event is updated and changes reflected.

title: Super Admin - System Level Management Screens
description: Verify Super Admin can access system-wide configuration screens for companies, users, and system reports and perform expected management actions.

steps.description: Login as Super Admin user.
Access dashboard, companies, users, reports, and system configuration screens.
Add or modify company data.
Changes saved and reflected in company list.
Manage user accounts and verify changes.
User account changes persist and are visible.

title: Collapsible Filters - Default Expanded and Toggle
description: Verify the collapsible filter sections are expanded by default and toggle correctly hiding and showing filter controls.

steps.description: Navigate to screens with collapsible filters (e.g. employee management, reports).
Filters are expanded by default and controls are visible.
Toggle the filters section to collapse.
Filter controls are hidden and section header indicates collapsed state.
Toggle the filters section to expand.
Filter controls are visible again.

title: UI Loading, Empty, and Error States
description: Verify that loading skeletons show during data fetch, empty states display when no data is present, and error states show appropriate messages with retry options on failure.

steps.description: Navigate to key screens and simulate data loading state.
Loading skeleton UI is displayed.
Simulate no data condition.
Empty states with informative messages and guidance are displayed.
Simulate data fetch error.
Error state UI shows descriptive message and retry control.

title: Navigation Router Guards and Redirects
description: Verify that router guards prevent unauthenticated access to protected routes and redirect users properly after login and company selection.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected dashboard routes while unauthenticated.
User is redirected to login screen.
Login as user and complete company selection.
User is routed to correct role-specific dashboard.

title: Responsive Layout on Mobile, Tablet, and Desktop
description: Verify UI layout adapts correctly without overflow or clipping on different screen sizes and orientations.

steps.description: Open app on mobile device or emulator.
Layout is correctly adapted with accessible controls.
Resize to tablet viewport.
UI rearranges appropriately, no overflow or clipping.
Resize to desktop size.
Layout uses larger viewport efficiently and remains visually consistent.

title: Accessibility Compliance - Semantic Labels and Color Contrast
description: Verify UI elements have semantic labels, tooltips, sufficient touch target sizes, and meet color contrast standards for accessibility.

steps.description: Use accessibility inspection tools to inspect all interactive UI controls.
All buttons, inputs, links have semantic labels for screen readers.
All UI elements meet minimum color contrast guidelines.
Tooltips are present on icons where applicable.

title: Design System Components Consistency
description: Verify reusable components such as stat cards, buttons, filters, and empty/error states conform to design standards and appear consistent across screens.

steps.description: Navigate through key app screens using reusable components.
Colors, typography, spacing, and border radius conform to design tokens.
Visual consistency maintained across different feature screens.

title: Debug Tools and Component Showcase Functionality
description: Verify debug menu, debug harness, and component showcase screens display UI components correctly and assist in development and testing.

steps.description: Navigate to debug tools screens.
All showcased components render correctly and interactive test examples function.
